AT45DB321C.h File Reference

Board specific Dataflash commands header for the AT45DB321C as mounted on the Atmel EVK527. More...

#define DF_MANUFACTURER_ATMEL   0x1F

#define DF_STATUS_READY   (1 << 7)
#define DF_STATUS_COMPMISMATCH   (1 << 6)
#define DF_STATUS_SECTORPROTECTION_ON   (1 << 1)

Detailed Description

Board specific Dataflash commands header for the AT45DB321C as mounted on the Atmel EVK527.

Note:
This file should not be included directly. It is automatically included as needed by the dataflash driver dispatch header located in LUFA/Drivers/Board/Dataflash.h.
